text:
Hi Svenja.
Great work with HTML and Visual Basic!
Yes, work experience is very important. It definitely helps you choose your career path. Even in university you mostly don't get to know how it is in the real world. Only after leaving the university and starting a real job you start to realize what a job really means and how an industry works. So getting some insights early on is very very helpful!
Does your school allow you to do any part time jobs or jobs during holidays?
Are there any offers from your school for that?
